author: jpieper
msg: Display the correct path when erroring out on a copy source from a
different repository.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/commit.c
(add_directory, add_file): Fix displayed path in error message.

author: jpieper
msg: Make svn_ra_get_log obey its docstring and ignore NULL paths arguments
over ra_local and ra_dav, ra_svn already did the correct thing.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_local/ra_plugin.c
(svn_ra_local__get_log): Treat NULL paths as zero length array.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/log.c
(svn_ra_dav__get_log): Treat NULL paths as zero length array.

author: jpieper
msg: Clarify that svn_ra_get_file should not call svn_stream_close on
output stream when it has completed pushing the file data across it.
Fix ra_svn in this regard so that it is consistent with the other two
RA layers.
* subversion/include/svn_ra.h
(svn_ra_get_file): Clarify docstring.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/client.c
(ra_svn_get_file): Do not call svn_stream_close on the output
stream when finished.

author: jszakmeister
msg: Fix a test that was accidentally broken during the cleaning up URL paths in
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/copy_tests.py
(old_dir_url_to_url): Remove a comma that accidentally slipped in.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add in changes to dist.sh from r13838 that were not vetoed or likely not to
cause a veto.
* dist.sh:
Add in support for curl if wget is not available; Add -sign option to use
PGP/GPG if available; Add -nodeps option to not error out if dependencies
are missing; Delay error from not having dependencies until we need them;
add a comment as to why we need pax and wget/curl (r13848); factor out
installation of dependencies into a common shell function to eliminate
duplicate code; use variables for fetching book PDF & HTML to allow
curl/wget.
